title: Blueprint template lookup not documented enough
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['docs/blueprints.rst', 'docs/templating.rst', 'flask/blueprints.py', 'flask/templating.py', 'flask/app.py'], 'reasoning': "1. docs/blueprints.rst: Main documentation for blueprints; should clearly explain how the new template lookup works for blueprints, including the use of the template_folder argument and that the templates folder is added to the search path.
2. docs/templating.rst: Main template documentation; should detail the new blueprint template lookup scheme, making it clear how blueprint templates folders are integrated into the app's template search path instead of previous name-based hacks.
3. flask/blueprints.py: Docstrings and comments (especially for Blueprint and BlueprintSetupState) should be updated to explain the behavior of template_folder and how registration impacts the template search path.
4. flask/templating.py: Docstrings and comments (not functional code) in Environment and DispatchingJinjaLoader should clarify how templates are located, especially regarding blueprints and the search path.
5. flask/app.py: Minor clarification may be needed in comments or docstrings about how the app integrates blueprints and sets up template lookup (since it imports and wires up these classes)."}
